Deployment Files:
-----------------
1. STANDALONE APP (.next/)
   - Full Next.js application with SSR
   - Includes API routes and server components
   - Size: ~2MB compressed
   - Use for: Self-hosted full application

2. WIDGET BUNDLE (dist/widget/)
   - customgpt-widget.js (106 KB) - Main widget with conversation management
   - customgpt-widget.css (64.5 KB) - Tailwind-based styles
   - vendors.js (1.17 MB) - React, ReactDOM, and dependencies
   - index.html - Demo page for testing
   - Use for: Embedding chat in any website

3. IFRAME BUNDLE (dist/iframe/)
   - iframe-app.js (100 KB) - Iframe-specific application
   - iframe-app.css (63.6 KB) - Iframe styles
   - vendors.js (1.17 MB) - Shared React dependencies
   - index.html - Iframe container page
   - Use for: Iframe embedding with isolation

File Sizes After Build:
----------------------
Widget Total: ~1.34 MB (gzipped: ~400 KB)
Iframe Total: ~1.33 MB (gzipped: ~395 KB)
Standalone: ~2 MB (varies by page)

When to Use Each Build:
-----------------------
1. WIDGET: Best for most integrations
   - Direct DOM embedding
   - Full API access
   - Session-based conversations
   - Custom styling support

2. IFRAME: Use when you need:
   - Complete style isolation
   - Cross-domain embedding
   - Sandbox security
   - Legacy browser support

3. STANDALONE: Use when you need:
   - Full control over the application
   - Custom API endpoints
   - Server-side rendering
   - Database integration
